summary: Simon thanks Noxy.

summary: Simon posts first Hytale Legacy screenshot
mainText:
'Hytale legacy engine is back.

Here is the first screenshot of its return.
More screenshots will be posted on @Hytale

Original vision is back.
We are back home.' by Simon

(Official notes from Simon on the Hytale Discord:

Zone 3, Shadow Knight (Temporary Name)
 
- DoF is on for this screenshot
- Doesn't have a spawn or purpose yet, just looks cool and I wanted to share. Modders can do whatever with it.
- We have plans to make it a late game boss fight, no work done on it yet, too busy fixing game as a whole.)

summary: Simon says he'll record raw footage, share it today.
mainText:
'PSA: I don't want to spend too much time making clips or marketing myself, so I'll be recording raw footage this morning, and I'll dumb it here when I'm done later today, bugs and all. I need to get back to work on what matters: fixing the game. Set your expectations low; the game is broken. Not good. It's our mission to make it good and then do our best to make it great over the years to come.

My social media team will be sharing screenshots and clips in the coming hours and days. Blog posts are in the works as well.

Time to LOCK IN and get ready for early access.' by Simon

summary: Screenshots/clips/art can be monetized on YouTube
mainText: 'You can monetize all of our screenshots/clips/art on YouTube. Make content, have fun.' by Simon

summary: Simon says Saving and Releasing Hytale are the most important steps/promises.
mainText:
'What matters is the promises I made to the players: Save Hytale, release Hytale and make it good.

We are now working on step 2: release Hytale.' by Simon

summary: Hytale shared Zone 4 Burned Skeleton
mainText:

(Info from the Hytale Discord by BuddhaCat:

Zone 4 Burned Skeleton (WIP name)
- Like the Shadow Knight (above), DoF was used in this screenshot
- Intended to be a challenging/higher tier skeleton for players to fight
- As with all of our NPCs, modders can use this enemy however they see fit!)

summary: Slikey discusses height limit, cubic chunks.
mainText:
'100% Covering that, I cant reply to all tweets but already telling you that we currently have a height limit right now at 320 blocks. We didn't know better in 2016. No promise on timeline for revisiting this but we believe in @thinkofdeath who has already done lots of improvements in our voxel storage tech and he ain't done yet.
' by Slikey

(For reference: Minecraft's height limit extends from -64 to 320 (totalling 384 blocks))

summary: Simon shares first look at Creation Tools tab in Hytale.
mainText:
'A new tab called Creation Tools is now in Hytale to help you explore what is possible as a creator.
Ô∏ÄÔ∏Ä
Ô∏ÄÔ∏ÄFrom simple NPC spawning to complex World Gen Editor.
Ô∏ÄÔ∏Ä
Ô∏ÄÔ∏ÄThe vision for modding in Hytale is simple: keep it beginner-friendly, easy to learn, and part of the game itself. You can stick to basic tools or go deeper with advanced ones, like the World Gen Editor, which lets you control whole-world generation. A blog on that is coming soon.
Ô∏ÄÔ∏Ä
Ô∏ÄÔ∏ÄMore updates for creators are in the works!' by Simon

(First look at Creation Tools; Asset Editor, Model Editor, Worldgen Editor, World Tools, Builder Tools, Machinima, etc.

World Tools includes: Prefab Editor, Prefab List, Spawn NPC, Spawn Particle, Change Player Model, Tint Chunk, and Instances.)

summary: Simon teases Updated Kweebecs spawning in a different place.
mainText:
'@crispacorn Adding them soon, just got the files.
They will spawn in a different place‚Ä¶ you will soon learn.' by Simon

("Updated Kweebecs" refers to the redesigned Kweebecs that were created under Riot Games)

summary: Simon saw his first Mosshorn yesterday

summary: Simon confirms Hytale will be using Blockbench
mainText: 'Hytale will be using Blockbench going forward ' by Simon

summary: Simon confirms everything can be edited while the game/server is running.
mainText:
'@PirateSoftware Yes, and all of this can be edited while the game/server is running.' by Simon

(This means custom items, item/monster logic, particle effects, and more can be edited while the game/server is running.)

summary: Simon discusses revenue split with mods/servers.
mainText:
'Hytale will take 0% from modders and server owners for at least the first 2 years.

We will trust that they bring us players; that is all.

We will not have any exclusivity clauses.

By the players, for the players.' by Simon

summary: Simon says in-game discovery of mods is post-launch goal.
mainText: 'After launch we will work on discovery in-game.' by Simon

mainText: 'genau!' by Polina

summary: Simon talks about free/paid mods, % cuts
mainText:
'I suspect that many mods will be free. We will allow authors to enable purchases so players can support their work if they wish to. Maybe even allow authors to have a system where they can give for free and let users pick a price, like itch io.

Not taking a % means we are more likely to feature free mods, unlike other platforms.. We will be fairer and less driven by shareholders seeking to push income by only featuring the highest-revenue generator.

Give us some time to figure everything out and making it fair to both creators and players :)' by Simon

working on itüòÖ' by Simon

summary: Hytale posts 16 minutes of gameplay footage.
mainText:
'16+ minutes of brand new gameplay footage. A taste of things to come. Enjoy, Cursebreakers ‚ù§Ô∏è #Hytale' by Hytale

(Simon on Discord: I promised players videos, screenshots and blog posts. One day after the acquisition, I‚Äôm keeping that promise. Now that you‚Äôve seen the first gameplay footage in a long time, I‚Äôm heading back to work on the early access launch. The team will share more clips and screenshots as we go.
It mattered to me to release raw footage today so we break the curse once and for all.)

summary: Simon provides brief statement on gameplay.
mainText:
'Recorded and edited this morning by me, just raw, random footage. I mean, I even forgot to mute my mic so you can hear me clicküòÖ

Keep in mind, Hytale is incomplete and buggy, but still beautiful and fun. We have a lot of work to make this a good game, but I believe in my team. The progress we have made in the last few weeks has been incredible.

I made three promises;

1. Save Hytale
2. Release more videos/screenshots
3. Launch Hytale

We are now working on promise #3

See you soon.' by Simon

summary: Simon says stack size will be increased.
mainText:
'Yeah I made a ticket for it, it's gonna get updated soon :)' by Simon

(Was 50)

summary: Simon shows how stack size is easy to configure
mainText:
'Super easy to configure. You can make it 1000+ if you want.

Look.

Hit save, and it auto updates in-game, no restart required.' by Simon

summary: DSN responds to HytaleNews post about Map
mainText: 'MEME GIF' by DevSlashNull

summary: Slikey explains something to do with mods and plugins and BungeeCord idk
mainText: 'Taking it in for the events and permissions - BungeeCord we replaced with a transfer packet that allows you to send players to other server + a small payload so you can add tokens / encrypted data for transport.' by Slikey

summary: World Size will be handled in Worldgen blogpost
mainText: 'Will be handled in worldgen post' by Slikey

summary: Comprehensive WorldGen blogpost later

summary: Simon says enemy encounters aren't fully configured yet
mainText:
'They are not configured yet, look how some skeletons are smarter than the others.
Got someone on fixing it!

Will showcase later on' by Simon

summary: Simon provides long notes on gameplay footage.
mainText:
'Please note that this gameplay is unfinished, raw footage recorded this morning. 

It's missing many NPC configs (which is why some are just auto-attacking). 
The overlay for wood cutting is too dark, and wood cutting in general is too fast for the Iron tier.
The bow was basically in debug mode and gave signature moves for every attack. 
The NPCs are not balanced yet in terms of HP/DMG and other stats.
The weather with the biome transitions is not good.
Countless bugs.
I didn't include crafting/cozy because I didn't prepare this video at all, I just recorded on the fly; we will post something more cozy/living world later.
and the list goes on and on.
The character sheet UI is temporary.
The portal at the end is unfinished, but I decided to put it anyway.
The gun near the end sounds weird, but it was a funny meme to put on.
Missing NPCs in many zones.
I have over 100 notes from this video.

Working on it, fixing it all.' by Simon

summary: Simon answers a slew of questions about the state of the game.
mainText:
'1. no campaign
2. only 4 zones at the moment but a surprise soon
3. ocean is there but lackluster
4. Some boss but broken, not sure if time to fix before EA
5. No magic system per say, just some magic items like a wand, totems and such - limited but will be expanded later after EA' by Simon
